text: Hmmm... Give us a moment, would ya guide?
Kenshiro settles into their stance, feet as firm as the roots of a mountain. You look down, feeling a wave of shame, hands trembling slightly, breath shallow. The imposing drummer notices.
You are nervous. I know of nerves, how they can consume you and hold your will hostage.
I can share a technique with you, one that allows you to take back your voice.
It is called box breathing. Breath in for four counts... hold for four counts... breathe out for four counts... and hold again for four. Let's try it together.
How do you feel? Better, right?
I feel... more in control. Thank you, this will really help!
What do you want to know?
